pages.text: Mystium Tools all have very unique abilities, those which make them even more powerful.$(p)They are activated by SHIFT-RIGHT CLICKING them, but this only works if they are charged. Speaking of charging...
The Mystium Tools have a power capacity which will use the charge before durability. The tools can be charged by placing a Chest on the Tool Charger and placing the Mystium Tools in the Chest.
The Pickaxe's $(3)Secondary Ability $()is to mine in a 3x3 pattern, allowing you to hollow the earth with ease.
The Shovel's $(3)Secondary Ability $()is to mine soft Dirt downwards up to 5 blocks in a row, allowing you to quickly terraform hills and fields.
The Sword's $(3)Secondary Ability $()is to harvest and bind an $(l:blocks/mob_farming#mobcrystal)Inert Mob Crystal,$() allowing you to harness the power of mob spawning.
The Axe's $(3)Secondary Ability $()is to chop down an entire tree at once while only breaking the bottom block, allowing forests to be felled quickly and swiftly.
The Hoe's $(3)Secondary Ability $()is to generate $(item)Mystium Farmland,$() a block that acts as normal Farmland, accelerates plant growth, and never dehydrates!
